## modelStudio

# everybody love modelStudio!!

```{r}
library("DALEX")
library("ranger")
library("modelStudio")

```

explain model

```{r}
# fit a model
model <- ranger(score ~., data = happiness_train)

# create an explainer for the model    
explainer <- explain(model,
                     data = happiness_test,
                     y = happiness_test$score,
                     label = "Random Forest")

# make a studio for the model
modelStudio(explainer)
```
